body: Dear Employee, This is a simulated phishing email sent as part of your organization's security awareness training. Its purpose is to help you recognize and respond to potential phishing attempts. Please click the link below and follow the instructions: Verify Your Account If you suspect this email to be suspicious, avoid clicking the link and report it to your security team immediately.
subject: Important Notification: Please Read
explanation: This email is designed to simulate a phishing attempt. It is part of your training program to improve awareness of social engineering tactics and cybersecurity threats. The goal is to reinforce good practices and ensure employees can identify and avoid real phishing attempts.
